page.title: 07Industry-Llanhari area
page.content: { }In the area surveyed by our school the main industrial area is situated at Coedcae Lane, between the A473 and the main London-South Wales railway line,south west of Talbot Green. The biggest factories are L'Oreal (Golden Ltd), Outline Upholstery, Staedtler (U.K.) and Wella (Ondawel (G.B.)Ltd). Both L'oreal and Wella produce cosmetics and toiletries ,Outline Upholstery produces furniture and Staedtler produces pencils and writing equipment. At Coedcae Lane there is also a modern industrial estate where there are a number of smaller factories producing a wide range of products. The biggest employer in Pontyclun is the Crown Brewery which employs 200 people.
